summary: TRAVELING NORTH ON I-85 IN GA AT 72 MPH; ABOUT 3 MILES SOUTH OF EXIT 28. MEDIUM RAIN AND TEMP IN THE MID TO UPPER 60'S. THE TIRE FAILED ON THE LEFT REAR AND BLESSED THAT I COULD DRIVE ON THE MEDIAN ABOUT 225 FT. THERE WAS NOT ANY ROAD HAZARDS, STRICTLY TIRE FAILURE!! MY WIFE IS EYE WITNESS.
